div.pre: 1651 Beni Hasan, 250 km. S of Cairo, 1903 (144) Burial: c. 360 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 77 AR, ingots. Pot hoard from excavations Athens: 54 tetradr. (5th cent. type) 1 dr. Sidon: 4 double-shekels 8 half-shekels 5 fr. Tyre: 4 shekels Gaza: 1 frag. Disposition: Liverpool (Arch. Inst.) some; Toronto (cf. Sotheby June 26, 1922, lots 724, 726-7); London 4; Athens 7 ingots Milne, RevArch 1905, pp. 257-61; RN 1905, pp. 235-6; JEA 1933, pp. 119-121 Robinson, NC 1937, pp. 197-9 Schlumberger, L'argent glee, p. 10, no. 26
